name: Poem
title: Android
summary: Poem is an Android application that offers a curated selection of the finest poems by renowned Persian poets. It features powerful customization options, advanced search functionality, and a fast, user-friendly interface.
explain:
Poem is an Android application that offers a curated selection of the finest poems by renowned Persian poets. It features powerful customization options, advanced search functionality, and a fast, user-friendly interface.

Project features:

- Advanced search with size limitation and count.

- Customization of background, colors, and fonts

- Sharing poems ability

- Add items to favorites

- Copy poem text

- Compatible with multi-size devices
